name: exit
responses: Ok, Hope I could help. Bye!

name: unhappy
responses: I am sorry you are unappy with me. I am still learning, so there might still be hope for me.

name: insulting
responses: Please stay polite, I am doing my best and don't deserve to be treated like this!

name: &otherwise
responses: Sorry, I did not understand that. Can you please rephrase?
